page.title: 08BURNHAM MARKET - POPULATION
page.content: There are nearly 400 people living in the survey area, and most of these live in the council housing just south of the village centre. We have a large population of elderly people: most of the private houses are owned by people who have moved to Burnham Market after their retirement. Burnham Market is in the county of Norfolk and is in the Westminster parliamentary constituency of West Norfolk - our Member of Parliament is Henry Bellingham, and our Euro-M.P. is Paul Howell. We are part of the Borough of King's Lynn and West Norfolk. Our representatives are Squadron Leader Oliver on the county council and Viscount Coke on the borough council. The parish council, which consists of 11 people elected every three years, meets monthly in the village hall.
